verses.verse: <S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> that <S%H935>comes<s%> from <S%H123>Edom,<s%> with <S%H2556>dyed<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> from <S%H1224>Bozrah?<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> that is <S%H1921>glorious<s%> in his <S%H3830>apparel,<s%> <S%H6808>traveling<s%> in the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of his <S%H3581>strength?<s%> I that <S%H1696>speak<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H7227>mighty<s%> to <S%H3467>save.<s%>
<S%H4069>Why<s%> are you <S%H122>red<s%> in your <S%H3830>apparel,<s%> and your <S%H899>garments<s%> like him that <S%H1869>treads<s%> in the <S%H1660>winefat?<s%>

I have <S%H1869>trodden<s%> the wine <S%H6333>press<s%> <S%H905>alone;<s%> and of the <S%H5971>people<s%> there was <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H376><s%> with me: for I will <S%H1869>tread<s%> them in my <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H7429>trample<s%> them in my <S%H2534>fury;<s%> and their <S%H5332>blood<s%> shall be <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> on my <S%H899>garments,<s%> and I will <S%H1351>stain<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4403>raiment.<s%>
For the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> is in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and the <S%H8141>year<s%> of my <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> is <S%H935>come.<s%>

And I <S%H5027>looked,<s%> and there was <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5826>help;<s%> and I <S%H8074>wondered<s%> that there was <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5564>uphold:<s%> therefore my own <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H3467>brought<s%> <S%H3467>salvation<s%> to me; and my <S%H2534>fury,<s%> it <S%H5564>upheld<s%> me.

And I will <S%H947>tread<s%> down the <S%H5971>people<s%> in my <S%H639>anger,<s%> and make them <S%H7937>drunk<s%> in my <S%H2534>fury,<s%> and I will <S%H3381>bring<s%> down their <S%H5332>strength<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

I will <S%H2142>mention<s%> the loving <S%H2617>kindnesses<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1580>bestowed<s%> on us, and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2898>goodness<s%> toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H1580>bestowed<s%> on them according to his <S%H7356>mercies,<s%> and according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his loving <S%H2617>kindnesses.<s%>
For he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> they are my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> that will not <S%H8266>lie:<s%> so he was their <S%H3467>Savior.<s%>

In <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6869>affliction<s%> he was <S%H6862>afflicted,<s%> and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of his <S%H6440>presence<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> them: in his <S%H160>love<s%> and in his <S%H2551>pity<s%> he <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> them; and he <S%H5190>bore<s%> them, and <S%H5375>carried<s%> them <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old.<s%>

But they <S%H4784>rebelled,<s%> and <S%H6087>vexed<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit:<s%> therefore he was <S%H2015>turned<s%> to be their <S%H341>enemy,<s%> and he <S%H3898>fought<s%> against them.

Then he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and his <S%H5971>people,<s%> saying, <S%H346>Where<s%> is he that <S%H5927>brought<s%> them up out of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> of his <S%H6629>flock?<s%> <S%H346>where<s%> is he that <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> him?

That <S%H3212>led<s%> them by the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> with his <S%H8597>glorious<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> <S%H1234>dividing<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, to <S%H6213>make<s%> himself an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8034>name?<s%>
That <S%H3212>led<s%> them through the <S%H8415>deep,<s%> as an <S%H5483>horse<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that they should not <S%H3782>stumble?<s%>

As a <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H1237>valley,<s%> the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> caused him to <S%H5117>rest:<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> did you <S%H5090>lead<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> yourself a <S%H8597>glorious<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>

<S%H5027>Look<s%> down from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> from the <S%H2073>habitation<s%> of your <S%H6944>holiness<s%> and of your <S%H8597>glory:<s%> <S%H346>where<s%> is your <S%H7068>zeal<s%> and your <S%H1369>strength,<s%> the <S%H1995>sounding<s%> of your <S%H4578>bowels<s%> and of your <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> me? are they <S%H662>restrained?<s%>

<S%H3588>Doubtless<s%> you are our <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> be <S%H3808>ignorant<s%> <S%H3045><s%> of us, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> us not: you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> are our <S%H1>father,<s%> our <S%H1350>redeemer;<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> is from <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> have you made us to <S%H8582>err<s%> from your <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H7188>hardened<s%> our <S%H3820>heart<s%> from your <S%H3374>fear?<s%> <S%H7725>Return<s%> for your <S%H5650>servants'<s%> <S%H4616>sake,<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of your <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> of your <S%H6944>holiness<s%> have <S%H3423>possessed<s%> it but a <S%H4705>little<s%> <S%H4705>while:<s%> our <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> have <S%H947>trodden<s%> down your <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>
We are yours: you <S%H5769>never<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H4910>bore<s%> <S%H4910>rule<s%> over them; they were not <S%H7121>called<s%> by your <S%H8034>name.<s%>
